lines.text: Here comes another victim. An unsuspecting little bumble bee. Oh, poor little bee.
Ah, here are some cute little baby rabbits who have wandered away from their mother. But wait. WHAT'S THIS? A VULTURE ABOUT TO POUNCE!
[a stereotypical Japanese vulture appears in the sky]
[the rabbits hop into a patch of grass and set up an anti-aircraft gun; one of them morphs into a certain better-known rabbit]
Eh, thumbs up, doc! Thumbs up!
